overview: A documentary that focuses on the critical value of our most precious natural resource and explores the ongoing threats to its future-both globally and in Ireland. Featuring Ireland’s coastal and inland waterways-as well as contributions from engineers, planners and consumers-the documentary explores the development and current state of Ireland’s public water network, presenting a unique perspective on the ongoing national project to upgrade the country’s drinking water supply and wastewater treatment.
title: The Story Of Water
